rows.label: qst701203_msg0002
rows.name:
...So, someone who knew
you made this for you.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm sorry. I had to see
for myself. Otherwise...

rows.label: qst701203_msg0004
rows.name:
Sharla-san wouldn't be
able to move forward.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0005
rows.name:
I know. If I were you, I
would have done the same.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0006
rows.name:
It's just that a miracle
didn't happen this time.
It's not your fault, Laura.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0007
rows.name:
That's right... So please
don't look so sad.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0009
rows.name:
Thales-san, I wonder if
he left anything behind.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0010
rows.name: Something? In a state like this?

rows.label: qst701203_msg0011
rows.name:
He was said to be a cautious person.
He may have anticipated this.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0012
rows.name:
The fact that his purpose for coming
here is unclear also bothers me.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0013
rows.name:
Then, shall we investigate the area
around the house where he lived?

rows.label: qst701203_msg0014
rows.name: Your Majesty, please watch your step.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0015
rows.name: Wadatsumi, you're being a bit dramatic.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0016
rows.name: ...I wonder if he talked with Mother.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0017
rows.name:
If so, I must thank him. She must
have been so lonely by herself.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0018
rows.name:
You're right. I wish I could
have met him and asked...
